tooltips.help: Enter the details of the builds,releases and feature for which you want to know the priority of the defects
tooltips.title: Inputs Tab

tooltips.help: The Priority Column shows us the priority which have beed assigned to this defect in this release/build. The suggested priority is recommended by the tool based on how the defects was prioritised in previous release/builds
tooltips.title: Submit the priority of the defect
